properties.property: insert into t_za_wyxq (id, xqmc, sssqmc, sssqdm, ssjwqdm, ssjwqmc, dzmc, wygs, wygsfzr, lds, jcks, sfyjztcc, tcws, dwfzr, abfzr, dwfzrlxdh, abfzrlxdh, dwdh, dwbz, cyrs, bwll, bas, wssysbas, fhzbs, jgs, gws, zbrs, gwwzjrs, fbsxq, wq, dymj, wfqt, wfbz, spjks, dzwl, mjxt, jkzx, jfqt, sfzxzpba, pqbafwgs, sfba, pqbas, bazh, bafwqy, bajgbz, ssfxsjdm, ssfxsjmc, sspcsdm, sspcsmc, sqmjxm, sqmjjh, djrxm, djrjh, djrsfzh, djsj, djdwdm, djdwmc, czrxm, czrjh, czrsfzh, czdwdm, czdwmc, czsj, czbs, zxbs, zxyy,zxsj,xqmj,jlrq,ywwygs,dwfzrsfzh) values (#[id], #[xqmc], #[sssqmc], #[sssqdm], #[ssjwqdm], #[ssjwqmc], #[dzmc], #[wygs], #[wygsfzr], #[lds], #[jcks], #[sfyjztcc], #[tcws], #[dwfzr], #[abfzr], #[dwfzrlxdh], #[abfzrlxdh], #[dwdh], #[dwbz], #[cyrs], #[bwll], #[bas], #[wssysbas], #[fhzbs], #[jgs], #[gws], #[zbrs], #[gwwzjrs], #[fbsxq], #[wq], #[dymj], #[wfqt], #[wfbz], #[spjks], #[dzwl], #[mjxt], #[jkzx], #[jfqt], #[sfzxzpba], #[pqbafwgs], #[sfba], #[pqbas], #[bazh], #[bafwqy], #[bajgbz], #[ssfxsjdm], #[ssfxsjmc], #[sspcsdm], #[sspcsmc], #[sqmjxm], #[sqmjjh], #[djrxm], #[djrjh], #[djrsfzh], to_date(#[djsj],'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), #[djdwdm], #[djdwmc], #[czrxm], #[czrjh], #[czrsfzh], #[czdwdm], #[czdwmc], to_date(#[czsj],'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), #[czbs], #[zxbs], #[zxyy], to_date(#[zxsj],'yyyy-mm-dd'),#[xqmj],to_date(#[jlrq],'yyyy-mm-dd'),#[ywwygs],#[dwfzrsfzh])

update t_za_wyxq set xqmc = #[xqmc], sssqmc = #[sssqmc], sssqdm = #[sssqdm], ssjwqdm = #[ssjwqdm], ssjwqmc = #[ssjwqmc], dzmc = #[dzmc], wygs = #[wygs], wygsfzr = #[wygsfzr], lds = #[lds], jcks = #[jcks], sfyjztcc = #[sfyjztcc], tcws = #[tcws], dwfzr = #[dwfzr], abfzr = #[abfzr], dwfzrlxdh = #[dwfzrlxdh], abfzrlxdh = #[abfzrlxdh], dwdh = #[dwdh], dwbz = #[dwbz], cyrs = #[cyrs], bwll = #[bwll], bas = #[bas], wssysbas = #[wssysbas], fhzbs = #[fhzbs], jgs = #[jgs], gws = #[gws], zbrs = #[zbrs], gwwzjrs = #[gwwzjrs], fbsxq = #[fbsxq], wq = #[wq], dymj = #[dymj], wfqt = #[wfqt], wfbz = #[wfbz], spjks = #[spjks], dzwl = #[dzwl], mjxt = #[mjxt], jkzx = #[jkzx], jfqt = #[jfqt], sfzxzpba = #[sfzxzpba], pqbafwgs = #[pqbafwgs], sfba = #[sfba], pqbas = #[pqbas], bazh = #[bazh], bafwqy = #[bafwqy], bajgbz = #[bajgbz], ssfxsjdm = #[ssfxsjdm], ssfxsjmc = #[ssfxsjmc], sspcsdm = #[sspcsdm], sspcsmc = #[sspcsmc], sqmjxm = #[sqmjxm], sqmjjh = #[sqmjjh], czrxm = #[czrxm], czrjh = #[czrjh], czrsfzh = #[czrsfzh], czdwdm = #[czdwdm], czdwmc = #[czdwmc], czsj = to_date(#[czsj],'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), czbs = #[czbs], zxbs = #[zxbs], zxyy = #[zxyy], zxsj = to_date(#[zxsj],'yyyy-mm-dd'), xqmj = #[xqmj], jlrq = to_date(#[jlrq],'yyyy-mm-dd'), ywwygs = #[ywwygs], dwfzrsfzh = #[dwfzrsfzh] where id = #[id]

update t_za_wyxq set czrxm = #[czrxm], czrjh = #[czrjh], czrsfzh = #[czrsfzh], czdwdm = #[czdwdm], czdwmc = #[czdwmc], czsj = to_date(#[czsj],'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), czbs = #[czbs], zxbs = #[zxbs], zxyy = #[zxyy], zxsj = to_date(#[zxsj],'yyyy-mm-dd') where id = #[id]

select id, xqmc, sssqmc, sssqdm, ssjwqdm, ssjwqmc, dzmc, wygs, wygsfzr, lds, jcks, sfyjztcc, tcws, dwfzr, abfzr, dwfzrlxdh, abfzrlxdh, dwdh, dwbz, cyrs, bwll, bas, wssysbas, fhzbs, jgs, gws, zbrs, gwwzjrs, fbsxq, wq, dymj, wfqt, wfbz, spjks, dzwl, mjxt, jkzx, jfqt, sfzxzpba, pqbafwgs, sfba, pqbas, bazh, bafwqy, bajgbz, ssfxsjdm, ssfxsjmc, sspcsdm, sspcsmc, sqmjxm, sqmjjh, djrxm, djrjh, djrsfzh, to_char(djsj,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') as djsj, djdwdm, djdwmc, czrxm, czrjh, czrsfzh, czdwdm, czdwmc, to_char(czsj,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') as czsj, czbs, zxbs, zxyy, to_char(zxsj,'yyyy-mm-dd') as zxsj, xqmj, to_char(jlrq,'yyyy-mm-dd') as jlrq, ywwygs,dwfzrsfzh from t_za_wyxq where id = ?

select id, xqmc, sssqmc, sssqdm, ssjwqdm, ssjwqmc, dzmc, wygs, wygsfzr, lds, jcks, sfyjztcc, tcws, dwfzr, abfzr, dwfzrlxdh, abfzrlxdh, dwdh, dwbz, cyrs, bwll, bas, wssysbas, fhzbs, jgs, gws, zbrs, gwwzjrs, fbsxq, wq, dymj, wfqt, wfbz, spjks, dzwl, mjxt, jkzx, jfqt, sfzxzpba, pqbafwgs, sfba, pqbas, bazh, bafwqy, bajgbz, ssfxsjdm, ssfxsjmc, sspcsdm, sspcsmc, sqmjxm, sqmjjh, djrxm, djrjh, djrsfzh, to_char(djsj,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') as djsj, djdwdm, djdwmc, czrxm, czrjh, czrsfzh, czdwdm, czdwmc, to_char(czsj,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') as czsj, czbs, zxbs, zxyy, to_char(zxsj,'yyyy-mm-dd') as zxsj, xqmj, to_char(jlrq,'yyyy-mm-dd') as jlrq, ywwygs,dwfzrsfzh from t_za_wyxq where 1 = 1 #if($xqmc && !$xqmc.equals("")) and xqmc like #[xqmc] || '%' #end #if($djsjstart && !$djsjstart.equals("")) and djsj >= to_date(#[djsjstart]|| '00:00:00','yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') #end #if($djsjend && !$djsjend.equals("")) and djsj <= to_date(#[djsjend]|| '23:59:59','yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') #end #if($zxbs && !$zxbs.equals("")) and zxbs = #[zxbs] #end #if ($ywwygs && !$ywwygs.equals("")) and YWWYGS = #[ywwygs] #end #if($sqdm && !$sqdm.equals("")) and sssqdm = #[sqdm] #elseif($jwsqdm && !$jwsqdm.equals("")) and djdwdm = #[jwsqdm] #elseif($pcsdm && !$pcsdm.equals("")) and (djdwdm like substr(#[pcsdm],1,8)||'%') #elseif($countrygajgjgdm && !$countrygajgjgdm.equals("")) and djdwdm like substr(#[countrygajgjgdm],1,6)||'%' #elseif($citygajgjgdm && !$citygajgjgdm.equals("")) and djdwdm like substr(#[citygajgjgdm],1,4)||'%' #end

insert into t_za_wyxq_aqjc (id, xqmc, sspcsdm, sspcsmc, jcmjjh, jcmjxm, jcrq, qkms, zdlsnbzabwzd, lsnbzabwzr, lsygaqffpx, lfrywpdjsx, dymjxt, spbjxtyz, sfjztcc, yhbwfdcfdm, wqsfwh, sfzgabry, sfgqpx, sffwqxbj, sfcsgz, sfdqjy, sfybafz, sfrzlz, sfzzabdw, sfblzzba, wyxdwqid, aqyhms, mjclyj, aqcl, aqzgqx, sldspyj, sldjh, sldxm, sldspsj) values (#[id], #[xqmc], #[sspcsdm], #[sspcsmc], #[jcmjjh], #[jcmjxm], to_date(#[jcrq],'yyyy-mm-dd'), #[qkms], #[zdlsnbzabwzd], #[lsnbzabwzr], #[lsygaqffpx], #[lfrywpdjsx], #[dymjxt], #[spbjxtyz], #[sfjztcc], #[yhbwfdcfdm], #[wqsfwh], #[sfzgabry], #[sfgqpx], #[sffwqxbj], #[sfcsgz], #[sfdqjy], #[sfybafz], #[sfrzlz], #[sfzzabdw], #[sfblzzba], #[wyxdwqid], #[aqyhms], #[mjclyj], #[aqcl], #[aqzgqx], #[sldspyj], #[sldjh], #[sldxm], to_date(#[sldspsj],'yyyy-mm-dd'))

update t_za_wyxq_aqjc set xqmc = #[xqmc], sspcsdm = #[sspcsdm], sspcsmc = #[sspcsmc], jcmjjh = #[jcmjjh], jcmjxm = #[jcmjxm], jcrq = to_date(#[jcrq],'yyyy-mm-dd'), qkms = #[qkms], zdlsnbzabwzd = #[zdlsnbzabwzd], lsnbzabwzr = #[lsnbzabwzr], lsygaqffpx = #[lsygaqffpx], lfrywpdjsx = #[lfrywpdjsx], dymjxt = #[dymjxt], spbjxtyz = #[spbjxtyz], sfjztcc = #[sfjztcc], yhbwfdcfdm = #[yhbwfdcfdm], wqsfwh = #[wqsfwh], sfzgabry = #[sfzgabry], sfgqpx = #[sfgqpx], sffwqxbj = #[sffwqxbj], sfcsgz = #[sfcsgz], sfdqjy = #[sfdqjy], sfybafz = #[sfybafz], sfrzlz = #[sfrzlz], sfzzabdw = #[sfzzabdw], sfblzzba = #[sfblzzba], wyxdwqid = #[wyxdwqid], aqyhms = #[aqyhms], mjclyj = #[mjclyj], aqcl = #[aqcl], aqzgqx = #[aqzgqx], sldspyj = #[sldspyj], sldjh = #[sldjh], sldxm = #[sldxm], sldspsj = to_date(#[sldspsj],'yyyy-mm-dd') where id = #[id]

select id, xqmc, sspcsdm, sspcsmc, jcmjjh, jcmjxm, to_char(jcrq,'yyyy-mm-dd') as jcrq, qkms, zdlsnbzabwzd, lsnbzabwzr, lsygaqffpx, lfrywpdjsx, dymjxt, spbjxtyz, sfjztcc, yhbwfdcfdm, wqsfwh, sfzgabry, sfgqpx, sffwqxbj, sfcsgz, sfdqjy, sfybafz, sfrzlz, sfzzabdw, sfblzzba, wyxdwqid, aqyhms, mjclyj, aqcl, aqzgqx, sldspyj, sldjh, sldxm, to_char(sldspsj,'yyyy-mm-dd') as sldspsj from t_za_wyxq_aqjc where wyxdwqid=?
